location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'The gates of the Temple of Ashtareth Babylon. Showing the moulded brick-work.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:179 x 150 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘45’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView in the ruins of Babylon (near Al Hillah) showing the Gates of the Temple of Ashtareth. High stone crumbling walls are visible in the middle and background.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'The gates of the Temple of Ashtareth Babylon. Showing the moulded brick-work.'
